# Arabic Calligraphy Generator

> A professional online Arabic calligraphy generator tool that creates beautiful Arabic text in various traditional and modern calligraphy styles. The tool offers real-time preview, extensive customization options, and educational content about Arabic calligraphy traditions.

This comprehensive platform serves calligraphy enthusiasts, designers, educators, and professionals who need high-quality Arabic text for their projects. Our tool combines traditional calligraphy artistry with modern digital technology to make Arabic calligraphy accessible to everyone.

Key features:
- Real-time Arabic calligraphy generation with 17+ authentic fonts
- Advanced text styling including shadows, outlines, gradients, and Kashida control
- Export options in PNG and SVG formats with transparent backgrounds
- Virtual Arabic keyboard for easy text input and diacritical marks
- Extensive template library with popular phrases and verses
- Educational content covering calligraphy history, styles, and techniques
- Mobile-responsive design optimized for all devices
- Social sharing capabilities for created calligraphy

Technical capabilities:
- Unicode-compliant Arabic text rendering
- Advanced typography controls (letter spacing, line height, text alignment)
- Gradient color support for artistic effects
- Background customization with patterns and images
- High-resolution output suitable for print and digital use
- Accessibility features for screen readers and keyboard navigation

## Tool

- [Arabic Calligraphy Generator](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/): Main calligraphy generation tool with real-time preview, font selection, styling options, and export functionality
- [Key Features](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/features): Overview of the tool's advanced features including Kashida control, gradient support, and template library
- [How to Use Tutorial](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/tutorials): Step-by-step guide for using the calligraphy generator effectively
- [Template Library](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/features#templates): Pre-designed calligraphy templates for common phrases and verses
- [Export Options Guide](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/tutorials#export): Detailed instructions for downloading and using generated calligraphy

## Docs

- [FAQ](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/faq): Frequently asked questions about Arabic calligraphy, fonts, and tool usage
- [Beginner's Guide to Arabic Calligraphy](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/beginners-guide-to-calligraphy): Complete tutorial for beginners starting their calligraphy journey
- [Understanding the Six Major Arabic Calligraphy Styles](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/six-major-calligraphy-styles): In-depth guide to Naskh, Thuluth, Kufi, Diwani, Ruq'ah, and Nastaliq styles
- [Font Selection Guide](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/tutorials#fonts): How to choose the right Arabic font for your project
- [Color Theory in Arabic Calligraphy](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/tutorials#colors): Guidelines for using colors effectively in calligraphy design
- [Typography Best Practices](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/tutorials#typography): Professional tips for Arabic text layout and spacing

## Fonts

- [Font Library](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts): Complete collection of 17 Arabic fonts with previews and historical background
- [Amiri Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/amiri): Classical Naskh style font perfect for formal documents and traditional calligraphy
- [Scheherazade Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/scheherazade): Unicode-compliant font supporting extensive Arabic script variants
- [Kufi Fonts Collection](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/reem-kufi): Modern and traditional Kufi style fonts for geometric calligraphy
- [Cairo Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/cairo): Contemporary sans-serif Arabic font for modern designs
- [Tajawal Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/tajawal): Clean, readable font suitable for digital and print applications
- [Lateef Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/lateef): Traditional Nastaliq style font for classical poetry and literature
- [Noto Naskh Arabic](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/noto-naskh-arabic): Google's comprehensive Arabic font supporting multiple languages
- [Mada Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/mada): Modern geometric Arabic font with multiple weights
- [El Messiri Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/el-messiri): Contemporary Arabic font with distinctive character
- [Harmattan Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/harmattan): Unicode-compliant font optimized for African languages
- [Jomhuria Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/jomhuria): Display font inspired by traditional Arabic signage
- [Lemonada Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/lemonada): Playful, rounded Arabic font perfect for creative projects
- [Marhey Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/marhey): Modern Arabic font with distinctive letter shapes
- [Markazi Text Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/markazi-text): Hybrid Arabic-Latin font for bilingual designs
- [Mirza Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/mirza): Elegant Arabic font with calligraphic influences
- [Rakkas Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/rakkas): Ornate display font inspired by Ottoman Turkish calligraphy
- [Aref Ruqaa Font](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/fonts/aref-ruqaa): Digital adaptation of the traditional Ruqaa script

## Blog

- [The Rich History of Arabic Calligraphy](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/the-rich-history-of-arabic-calligraphy): Comprehensive overview of Arabic calligraphy from its origins to modern times
- [10 Famous Arabic Calligraphers You Should Know](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/famous-arabic-calligraphers): Profiles of influential calligraphers and their contributions to the art
- [Modern Arabic Typography in Digital Design](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/modern-arabic-typography): How traditional calligraphy adapts to contemporary digital applications
- [The Relationship Between Quranic Text and Calligraphy](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/blog/quran-and-calligraphy): Exploring the spiritual and artistic connection in Islamic calligraphy

- [Educational Materials](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/features#use-cases): Creating teaching resources with beautiful Arabic text
- [Digital Media](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/features#use-cases): Preparing Arabic text for websites and social media
- [Print Design](https://arabic-calligraphy-generator.com/features#use-cases): High-resolution output for books, posters, and signage
